}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The only known FCC ID for this device is under the Amtran grantee code, specifically, MDZAZW9271-240.. some modules may also be '''Lite-On''' manufactured (model WN4614A) :Possible 05:90:00 or 00:19:DE OUI :"CUS233", "250-02407-010", and "Atheros Â©2012" is silkscreened on the device in the FCC photos. A label with "MAC: 00199DE3F8BE" is also affixed to the device in the FCC photos ('''VIZIO''' OUI).
